question: Which of the following provisions in Directive Principles of State Policy reflect the Gandhian Principles?
option1: To promote equal justice and to provide free legal aid to the poor
option2: Equitable distribution of material resources of the community for the common good
explanation: Gandhian ideology represents the programme of reconstruction enunciated by Gandhi during the national movement. Article 40 directs the state to organise village panchayats and endow them with necessary powers and authority to enable them to function as units of self-government.
